group_1.narration: This is Kamihama City Station.@You have arrived at Kamihama City Station.@Thank you for using our service.@Please make sure you have all of your belongings...

group_1.textCenter: (A-alright...@This time I won't be swept away...!)
(Just move at the same time as the people who are@leaving...)
(At this rate I won't be able to get off again.)
(Wait, even more people have gotten on board@than before...!)
(I wonder if it was too soon for me to try going to@the big Chuo Ward...)

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, the radio tower has an observation deck,@right?
That's where I want to show everyone how the@people we're supposed to be protecting live.

group_1.textCenter: (So... I have to get off safely at all costs...!)
(People are giving enough space for her to pass@through...)
(If I speak up, they'll let me through...)
E-excuse me...!@Coming through! Please make room!

group_1.textRight: Shizuka!

group_1.textLeft: Natsuki! I'm so sorry!

group_1.textRight: No no, I'm just glad you're safe!
So, now that we're back together, how about we@head to the radio tower?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
Um... will I have to take the train back again?

group_1.textRight: No, it's only one station away, so let's walk!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so we can walk...

group_1.textRight: The stations are pretty close to each other@around here.

group_1.textLeft: ...You seem really familiar with Chuo Ward, Natsuki.

group_1.textRight: I come here to play often enough, but I wouldn't@say I'm that familiar with it.

group_1.textLeft: Eh, but even though all these streets look the same,@you don't hesitate as you're walking at all.

group_1.textRight: I'm looking at my phone's map app!

group_1.textLeft: This plate also has a mapu?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, your phone should have it too...
Could I take a look at it?

group_1.textLeft: S-sure...

group_1.textRight: You open this app and then type in where@you want to go...

group_1.textLeft: The arrow is moving...

group_1.textRight: This is your current location.
Start the navigation here and it'll guide you to your@destination.

group_1.textLeft: ...H-hehh.

group_1.textRight: Since we're here, why don't we practice walking@around town with the navigation app?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'll give it a try.

group_1.narration: "Your destination is on the left.@Thank you for your work."

group_1.textLeft: ...Eh?@Ah, we're here...?

group_1.textRight: Yep, it's the radio tower!

group_1.textLeft: I didn't know what was going on...

group_1.textRight: You were about to go too far around this bend...

group_1.textLeft: Well, all of these roads look the same.
I don't want to be told to suddenly turn ahead...

group_1.textRight: Hmm...
Are you going to be okay when you come here@with the branch families...?

group_1.textLeft: ...When that time comes, I'll have to rely on my@friends since they're more familiar than I am...
I'll stick with Charu and Sunao when I leave town...
...Wow... It's just as amazing as I heard, you can see@the whole town from here...
I wonder if you can also see Suitoku Temple@from here.

group_1.textRight: Since Suitoku Shopping Center is in that area,@it should be near there...

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps...!@I think that might be the answer.

group_1.textRight: Hehe, I hope so.

group_1.textLeft: As I thought, I really want to show this@to the branch families.
This everyday life of the people of the Land of the@Rising Sun is what we Diviners should protect...

group_1.textRight: You said that earlier, too.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that is the honor of our clan.

group_1.textRight: Honor...?

group_1.textLeft: We fight not for the fulfillment of wishes, but for@the people who live in the Land of the Rising Sun.
That is the Tokime Clan.

group_1.textRight: ...Um, I don't know if I fully get it.

group_1.textLeft: Kamihama just suffered from a disaster, and yet@everyone still lives here cherishing each day.
These modest daily lives are what we Diviners@should strive to protect...
As a Magical Girl, don't you agree?

group_1.textRight: Ahh, I get it...@So that's how you look at it.
You just want to help everyone.

group_1.textLeft: That's why I want the branch families to see this.
Because the sight of what we should protect@is laid out here.
...*Sigh*...@This is still impossible for me...
Without you here, I'd never have gotten out of@Chuo Ward...

group_1.textRight: Aren't you exaggerating a bit?

group_1.narration: "The train will be arriving at the platform shortly..."

group_1.textRight: Ah, the train is here!
There's usually a ton of people here around now,@so don't let go of my hand.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...@You're my lifeline...
Thank you for escorting me.
You really saved me by leading the way@on the train.

group_1.textRight: If you'd like, I can come pick you up on the day of@my exchange match too!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!@I'll be looking forward to it!
